# INNoteContent

**Class**

An abstract class that defines the types of content contained in notes.

## Declaration

```swift
class INNoteContent
```

## Overview

You don’t create instances of this class directly. Instead, you create instances of the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTextNoteContent] or [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INImageNoteContent] subclasses.

## Note Objects

- **INNote**: The content and metadata associated with a single note entry in your app.
- **INTextNoteContent**: The textual content of a note.
- **INImageNoteContent**: An image contained in a note.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- INImageNoteContent
- INTextNoteContent

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
